org.cleverbus.common.log
Class LogContextFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.cleverbus.common.log.LogContextFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class LogContextFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

A filter that provides web-application specific context information to the logging subsystem. The pieces of context information is:

  • REQUEST_URI - the URI of the current request,
  • REQUEST_ID - the globally unique identifier of the current request,
  • SESSION_ID - the identifier of the current HTTP session,
  • CORRELATION_ID - the identifier of asynchronous message
  • SOURCE_SYSTEM - the identifier of external source system

Version:
$Id: LogContextFilter.java 10803 2012-10-25 11:56:15Z jloose@CLANCE.LOCAL $
Author:
Michal Palicka, Jan Loose
